FTPixmapGlyph Class Reference

#include <FTPixmapGlyph.h>

Inheritance diagram for FTPixmapGlyph:

Detailed Description

FTPixmapGlyph is a specialisation of FTGlyph for creating pixmaps.

See also:
FTGlyphContainer
